text:
4.1 Daily supplementation with iron and folic acid for women during  
 pregnancy
WHO RECOMMENDATION
Daily oral iron and folic acid supplementation is recommended as part of antenatal care 
to reduce the risk of low birth weight, maternal anaemia and iron deficiency ( 176).
A suggested scheme for daily iron and folic acid supplementation in pregnant women is 
presented in Table I-9.
Table I-9 Suggested scheme for daily iron and folic acid supplementation in pregnant 
women
Supplement composition
